title: Protesters block Galle Road from Dehiwala demanding fuel
body_lines: The Galle Road had been blocked from Dehiwala by a group of people demanding for fuel.
The Police urged the motorist to use alternative routes to avoid the congestion.
Meanwhile, Panchikawatte Junction in Colombo was also blocked by protesters demanding fuel.
The Panchikawatte Junction was opened for vehicular movements after police assured the protesters that fuel will be supplied soon.
